name: Yash Gawde
headline: Founder | Automating Content Creation
about:
Hello, If you are a Hustler and want to start your own thing you are on the right ProfileI am Yash Gawde aka Bizibeast Founder at Hooked⭐️ 4X Founder⭐️ Built a Million Dollar Startup at 19⭐️ Scaled Design Agency to 3Lac/mo. in 60 days⭐️ Sold India's First Viral Meme NFT ⭐️ Sold 100+ NFTs as an Independent ArtistIt's been over 4 years in this entrepreneurial journey and it's been a Rollercoaster ride. I have put my hands and have experience in almost everything from NFTs and Crypto to Design and Digital Marketing I have tried it all. In some I failed, in some I aced.I Founded Elite NFT which was valued at a Million dollars by a VC at peak of the NFT Mania! Why? God knowsLater with my efforts to diversify and create new product Liqy I lost almost all the profits and was on the brink of bankruptcy but then I took a shot!I started a new Company "That's A 10" with the goal to Productize Design.That's A 10 provided Design as Subscription, where you get a dedicated team of experienced Designers as a monthly subscription which adds more control and flexibility. I scaled it to 3,00,000 MRR in just 60 days yet something was MISSINGI wanted to build a Product and while searching for my calling I ended up with Idea to Automate content creation with AI. That's when Hooked was born. At Hooked we are doing some really cool stuff to automate content creation with AI we are trying to automate Scripting, Shooting and Video Editing altogether to create best content.For more Information visit thehooked.coHello, If you are a Hustler and want to start your own thing you are on the right Profile

I am Yash Gawde aka Bizibeast Founder at Hooked

⭐️ 4X Founder
⭐️ Built a Million Dollar Startup at 19
⭐️ Scaled Design Agency to 3Lac/mo. in 60 days
⭐️ Sold India's First Viral Meme NFT 
⭐️ Sold 100+ NFTs as an Independent Artist

It's been over 4 years in this entrepreneurial journey and it's been a Rollercoaster ride. I have put my hands and have experience in almost everything from NFTs and Crypto to Design and Digital Marketing I have tried it all. In some I failed, in some I aced.

I Founded Elite NFT which was valued at a Million dollars by a VC at peak of the NFT Mania! Why? God knows

Later with my efforts to diversify and create new product Liqy I lost almost all the profits and was on the brink of bankruptcy but then I took a shot!

I started a new Company "That's A 10" with the goal to Productize Design.

That's A 10 provided Design as Subscription, where you get a dedicated team of experienced Designers as a monthly subscription which adds more control and flexibility. 

I scaled it to 3,00,000 MRR in just 60 days yet something was MISSING

I wanted to build a Product and while searching for my calling I ended up with Idea to Automate content creation with AI. That's when Hooked was born. 

At Hooked we are doing some really cool stuff to automate content creation with AI we are trying to automate Scripting, Shooting and Video Editing altogether to create best content.

For more Information visit thehooked.co
